properties.name: hofund.info.application.name
properties.description: The name of your application (will be used in queries so simpler names are prefered) name from pom.xml will be use, whe you set this to @application.version@

properties.name: hofund.info.application.version
properties.description: The version of yuor application, standard approach is the version from pom.xml by using @application.version@
